thread.title: Ground News - Blackfoot Animal Shelter breaking ground on new shelter spring 2024
thread.title_full: Ground News - Blackfoot Animal Shelter breaking ground on new shelter spring 2024

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Blackfoot Animal Shelter breaking ground on new shelter spring 2024
text:
Summary by Ground News Shelter directors hope to break ground on the new shelter in April or May of this year. The number of animals they care for in a year has tripled since 2016. The shelter is now taking donations to help build the new Shelter. To donate or for more information, click HERE. Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
KIFI Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: News-Press & Gazette Company Blackfoot Animal Shelter breaking ground on new shelter spring 2024 BLACKFOOT, Idaho (KIFI) - It's official - the City of Blackfoot is getting a new animal shelter. Local News 8 was the first to report plans to build a new shelter were in the works, after talking to Blackfoot Mayor Marc Carroll last month. Those plans have now become a reality, according to shelter directors. They hope to break ground on the new shelter in April or May of this year. According to shelter volunteers, the move comes after months o…
